website_summaries.verdict: This popular dog chaise is a steal when it comes to indulging your dog's comfort at a lower price.
pros: Orthopedic egg-crate provides support for dogs suffering from joint pain
Comes with a removable cover that is water resistant and machine washable
cons: Has a tendency to slide around floor
Customers complained about the product's durability

customer_reviews.title: NOT Memoryor Gel Foam! Incorrect Product Description
customer_reviews.text: Incorrect product description, NOT orthopedic. NOT memory foam. NOT gel foam. Just some cheap egg carton foam. Save your money and time buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Santiago

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I just opened this and set it on the floor, you can see in the video how she checks it out, testing it with her back toe, she laid down and hasn’t moved!! I love the feel and look of this bed. Bought the large, she is about 49# and had plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hill

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT dog bed - Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: I am SO glad I ordered this bed. My lab is about 100 lbs and this bed is PERFECT. There is room to spare and he really likes using the pillow. The bed is 4 inches thick and the pillow area is 7 inches thick. The Stone Gray color is beautiful...very nice looking bed! My dog moves this bed around the house depending on where I am. It is super light and I LOVE it.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great for bad hips
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 of these beds in the jumbo size and She loves it!!!!! My dog loves the contoured edges and is perfect for her hips. I also have a baby crib sheet over it for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Truthful Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very nice and solid for the price. Only time will tell if it’ll stand up to regular use, but so far my 120 lbs. worth of dogs fit comfortably on it together, and it doesn’t sag under their weight. As I write this review, the Boxer’s snores are resounding in approval! If my two start sleeping apart more often, I’ll definitely buy a second one, but they mostly prefer to snuggle together and the jumbo size bed is big enough for them to share.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Didn't hold up a week.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 8 year old greyhound mix who's starting to wake up with what I can only assume to be painful joint stiffness in the mornings. It seemed fantastic, and it really did work...for all of 5 nights. By the sixth night, the foam in the corner (where the two side arms meet) had completely collapsed, and now provides less than a half inch of padding to the floor. While this is due to the fact that she curls up exclusively in that corner and the rest of the bed has retained its shape, I was really hoping the density would hold out longer than it did, even with constant pressure in one location.
customer_reviews.author: zichik

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo is not for Jumbo dogs
customer_reviews.text: We ordered for our Dane who’s around 170lbs. We’ve used a baby mattress and twin size bed in the past but thought we’d get something more designed for him since he’s getting older. The bed comes wrapped tight and while it does puff up some, looks smaller than the pic (I measured to ensure it was the same dimensions and it was). It’s made of a memory foam that cushions as you step on it but does take some time to recover. The product is okay, although not worth $45 in my opinion, and you’ll need to order the size up if you want to ensure enough space.
customer_reviews.author: shaun

customer_reviews.title: The bed is just - ok.
customer_reviews.text: The bed is just ok. The picture is deceiving in that it shows a large heavy dog laying on it and the bed is fully supporting him without the foam compressing to 1/2 the size. It's ok. It's not memory foam or thick supportive foam. It's a basic bed that keeps him off the floor. You get what you pay for I suppose. Our dog seems to like to lay on the floor rather than lay on it - or in one of his other beds. NOTE: There is a slight pink color to the top of the bed. Pictures made it look like a cream color.
customer_reviews.author: DanicaLake17

customer_reviews.title: Better movement in shepherd with hip dysplasia
customer_reviews.text: Animals are fantastic placebo testers and I can honestly say that there is significant improvement in my shepherd’s gait and personality since we got this bed for her. It took her a few days to get used to and about a month to use it regularly. About a month after she started sleeping on it consistently I really noticed a difference in her movement, willingness to partake in physical activity, and her behavior. Nothing else about her diet, medication/supplements activity level, or environment has changed or was recently changed prior to adding the bed. 👌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Hudgens Family

customer_reviews.title: Not like the pictures
customer_reviews.text: This product is nothing like the pictures shown! The side bolsters are flat and lumpy. It is made with extremely cheap feeling fabrics and bolster stuffing feels like newspaper crumpled up inside of it. Will be returning right away.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly N Wittenmyer

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: My Shar-pei loves this, it's hard to get her off of it! I would highly recommend, it was a little pricy so I wanted to write a review for it in case people wondered whether they should splurge on it. I would say, absolutely yes you should. I would say the quality is about right for the price, and I can see this bed lasting a good long while.
customer_reviews.author: Kitena Suttles

customer_reviews.title: Cheap! You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: The zipper of the matress won’t close and came off just a week after use. The foam inside is cheap and definitely NOT a memory foam as advertised. This is a piece of trash. Luckily, I got a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Soft cover bed for a great price
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bed for the price! I ordered the Large size for my 62lb pitbull and it fits her perfectly! The cover is soft and my pit seems to like it
customer_reviews.author: Sparrow

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this bed
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this bed, I lay on it as much as the dog does and it’s firm, feels good on my back and the firm rolls on the ends fit the neck perfectly I wish I could get a twin Barcelona daybed width and length of this same foam mattress cause it’s firm enough to be the right comfort for a full length day bed frame and if it’s good for me it’s amazing for my dog baby boxer at 93lbs. I’m trying to figure out how I can make one myself but larger
customer_reviews.author: Scott Lee W.

customer_reviews.title: Orion Blue is 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers have mentioned the quality varying in the different color options. The Orion blue happened to perfectly match an accent wall in my house and had the cozy fleece pad so I choose that color in LARGE. As soon as I unwrapped it and folded it out it was puffed and ready to go. No odd smells. As you can see in the picture my 43 lb Shiba/ Chow mix, Chester,fits comfortably with room for activities. (I did add an square of old foam mattress topper underneath for extra padding and warmth from our loft floors). This dog bed is definitely nicer than I expected for the very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine White

customer_reviews.title: Shrinkwrap packaging ruined foam insert
customer_reviews.text: This looked like a good dog bed but when it arrived wrapped to the size of a watermelon I wondered. The foam insert wasn't the right material to do that to. 5 days later it is still lumpy and won't flatten even with books on it. Frustrating since now I need to package it to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Christine W.

customer_reviews.title: Chemical/nothing like the picture or discribtion
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product spent way too much money on what I thought was going to be a great bed turned out horrible. The bed was packaged terrible. It looks nothing like the discription. Worst of all smelled horrible strong chemical smell also had stuff on it
customer_reviews.author: Cortiny Curetont

customer_reviews.title: Not "MicroVelvet" but fleece
customer_reviews.text: This bed was flimsy foam and the fabric was not "micro-velvet" but a fleece. This was not a quality product and for the price I expected a bit more. It also measured a bit shorter than the description says.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: My two love this bed
customer_reviews.text: My two love this bed! I've got a 80lb collie/lab mix and a 55lb husky/shepherd mix who can both curl up comfortably together on this bed. It is in no way whatsoever chew proof so it's not worth the price if your dog is a frequent bed destroyer, but it's comfy and perfect for my one dog who likes to drape his head over the raised edge when he's snoring. It's soft and neutral colored, and overall this was a good buy for us!
customer_reviews.author: melissa cordell

customer_reviews.title: Design and Structure Are Great
customer_reviews.text: I really like the structure of the bed and the design. The cushion is easy to remove so cover may be washed. The cover itself...not crazy about the fabric as my dog's hair sticks to it. Any little piece of dirt shows up on the fabric as well. My dog is comfortable and he seems to like lounging on the bed, so I think if the fabric were just a little different, it would help out tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery. Easy to open.
customer_reviews.text: As long as two of my 4 dogs don’t destroy this bed, Mr. Charlie will be quite happy. He’s overweight and arthritis everywhere. But today, he’s loving his new bed. He’s been on it for 2 hours and I know his joints and bones are happy. I would like to get 2 replacement covers for the beds. My 2 young dogs destroyed the covers.
customer_reviews.author: trish lavine

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than the picture's look. Short measurements.
customer_reviews.text: I don't even know what to say. Ordered the "jumbo" bed and it's short on measurements. This no where near fits my poor dog. Came squished and never took shape. I don't even know how to ship it back. So disappointed as it's hard to find a bed to fit this animal.
customer_reviews.author: Funqueta

customer_reviews.title: Weak cover
customer_reviews.text: Cover was ripped off within a week. My dogs aren't a crazy destroyer or chewer. But you know how dogs scratch sometimes before they lay down for their spot? That's what they do here and there... then it made a hole...:( sigh... my money!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Ku

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bed is great but your dog should probably not be over 125 if you want it to last. Our dog used it for a few months and he is 150 the middle flattened out but he loved the sides to keep his head up. My son bought one and his is not flattening out as fast. You can see the one in the back is much flatter than the one in the front. When you step on it you can feel the floor.
customer_reviews.author: GENIA M MINTON

customer_reviews.title: Awful! Thin!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible dog bed! Egg shell pad that is at the most 2 inches thick. Do not but if you have a large dog! I sat on it and could feel the hard floor underneath. My dog hated it. I will have to buy an extra pad just to use this bed.
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure where the cooling comes in?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product b/c of the cooling gel advertising since there are tons of dog beds out in the market. The bed is nice but unfortunately it wasn't what I had expected. I don't understand where the cooling part of the bed come from. My dog barely goes on it and there's no grip on the bottom of the bed so it will slide all over the place on hard floors. It's very light weight and no substance to it. To be fair, the bed will work as a traditional dog bed however for what I was looking for, it did not meet my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: H. LEE

customer_reviews.title: Fits baby crib sheets to keep it clean!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bed for our 65 lb boxer. She is old and sometimea leaks when she gets up. This bed is the perfect size for baby crib sheets. I put a washable pee pad on the bed and a crib sheet over that to hd.it in place and wash everything often. Its been a real game changer (luckily, her meds kicked in and she doesnt leak anymore, but being able to wash everything has been so great!) She loves the shape, too...props her head up. Best dog bed ever.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Low Quality ; Not filled ; No Original Refund Available
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware- low quality. The edges of the bed aren’t even half-stuffed, providing no support. The bed itself does not seem to have any ( functioning ) cooling properties in it, though I payed more for that feature. Beware: you cannot get your money refunded to your original payment method. They will either replace it with another item (some items aren’t even dog beds) or they will refund your Amazon account. Will be more hesitant to order from Amazon due to this.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Albright

customer_reviews.title: Where's the bird because this item is cheap, cheap, cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this bed. It is so flimsy that it constantly gets unintentionally moved around the floor. My old dog gave up on it because it would slide when he stepped into and hurt his hips. Consider it comes shipped stuffed in a plastic bag wrapped in packing tape I guess it should have been no surprise. Forget trying to communicate with the seller because they don't care and just give excuses. Finally I got them to agree to take it back (after numerous emails) and then the super-thin, cheapo fabric on it tore when my little dog stepped on the bolster.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Gribble

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my picky dog.
customer_reviews.text: My dog would never lay on any dog bed so I got this one because he has arthritis and he needed a bed. I picked it because since he loves the floor so much I thought if I got him a bed that wasn’t fluffy like a pillow he might like it. The sides are perfect to keep his head up and he lays on it all the time. Still lays on the floor a lot though.. I have washed the cover and dried it. It was good quality. I’ve had it for about seven months with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Shae Darby

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, arrived in unusable condition
customer_reviews.text: Bed arrived damaged and appeared shoddily made. The inner seam of the zipper was already destroyed upon arrival, and the layers of the foam mattress were separated. One corner of the bed was smashed and, after several days, never expanded at all. The mattress itself smashed down to the floor in the center when my dog lay on it, so I wouldn't have kept it even if it weren't damaged. Returned this and purchased a memory foam bed from another brand. Super happy with my other purchase. Not going to return to this company for future bed needs.
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price. Not orthopedic, not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a orthopedic foam bed. It's just a thick eggshell. You can get the same affect by buying a mattress egg shell and folding it in half, plus it will save you about $20. The covering is nice and soft but poor quality. The bed I received was already seperating at the seams and had a split at the bottom. There is no way this bed cover will hold up in a washer or withstand an ancient 14yr lab and a 7 month old Husky. I was looking for a new bed since the Husky decided to shred my jumbo Petmaker bed. Those are alot better quality than this brand. I'm just going to order another.
customer_reviews.author: Adr3na

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: What a terrific buy for the price. It is literally a few inches of thick, soft and comfortable memory foam. The bed has an overall feel like a soft velvet. The ends are perfect for my dog who likes to lay with her head up and flat. If you put it against the wall, it becomes a little sofa. My boyfriend also loves it, lol. He lays his head on it when he snuggles with Winnie. I'd buy again and what a great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Wholly disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Most disappointing Amazon purchase of the year. After shipping issues were sorted out and I finally received the item I actually ordered it is a huge disappointment. The measurements listed are not accurate and it’s made of the cheapest materials imaginable. - “orthopedic foam” is nothing more than a cheap piece of egg crate circa 1970 travel trailers. - “faux fur” is so thin you can see through it - bolster meant for dogs to rest up against is a thin tube of polyfill.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Nunley

customer_reviews.title: Nice for crazy sleepers
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very weird with how he sleeps. (As you can see in one of the photos. He will lay upside down, stretched out, curled up.... This bed allows him to sleep however he wants to comfortably. He had a round bed but he would sometimes hang over the side of it and it looked uncomfortable to do. This one he's able to stretch out how he wants. I wouldn't say it's chew proof because within the first few weeks he chewed a portion of the side. But it is really easy to wash and clean. And it looks like the foam cushion inside is able to hold up for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: Joey S.

customer_reviews.title: As pictured, just wish it were bulkier!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a Jumbo size for my great dane and he loves it! It's not bulky enough, but it does the job. I noticed both my great danes really love the head rest at both ends of the bed. It gives good support! 4 star due to not being bulky enough. It does look like the picture though.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed, unfortunately the interior not so nice.
customer_reviews.text: This bed arrived quickly, expanded within 72 hours. I have two large dogs that took to the bed immediately. The older of the two has arthritis and she love this bed. Now for the not so nice part. I removed the cover to wash it after having the bed for just under 3 months. What I found was a hand drawn male body part. I have a sense of humor, but really? where is the quality control? I attempted to attach a picture of the image, however amazon will not post it as it is considered obscene. It would appear company can include unsolicited obscene graphics on the products they sell and not be flagged or held accountable.
customer_reviews.author: Fawn

customer_reviews.title: HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a huge disappointment this purchase has been. The 1 star rating is because it was delivered on time. My item was shoved in a box that was too small. The item looks to be returned because it had no plastic covering or tag of any sort. Nothing on the item or inside the box as to what brand it even is. The bed is not orthopedic. The inside is a cheap hard piece of foam. The arms are all disfigured and the inside is all broken. I am seriously shocked that anyone would ship this to a customer. To say I'm very upset and disappointed is an understatement. I have added pics to this review.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Not Memory Foam
customer_reviews.text: Description clearly states Gel-infused Memory Foam and there are supposed to be Fluffy railings to provide orthopedic support. I ordered the Jumbo Cooling gel foam Chaise. The Foam was nothing more than what I could have went to the craft store and bought and forget Fluffy railings. I even tried to fluff them and there was not enough stuffing to make them provide any support. Sent back right away. So if you are looking for an expensive piece of foam for your pet to lay on, this will work.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCamper2013

customer_reviews.title: Safe from puppy accidents!
customer_reviews.text: We love this bed. I purchased it for my 9 year old Doodle. While he usually sleeps on our bed sometimes at night he gets down on the floor. At the same time we got the bed, we got a puppy and her accident spot happened to be this bed.. ugh.. I soaked it up and spot cleaned it with an enzyme cleaner. Then she did it again!! I decided to take the cover off to wash, fully expecting it had soaked into the foam. To my delight, there was not one spot on the foam. The top was completely waterproof. I washed and air dried and it’s as good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: “Fleece” coming off from clean, lazy dogs sleeping on them.
customer_reviews.text: Update - 11/7/19 - these beds are completely unusable now. What a waste. When I first got this bed I thought it was amazing. I quickly ordered another one for my other dog only to find out that a few weeks later I’d be sorry I wasted my money. The fleece is coming off in clumps from just dogs laying on them (no digging or pawing at the bed) and I find the fluff everywhere. It is happening on both beds. So much of it has come off that there are totally bare spots that continue to grow. I wish I could return but it’s been too long. Do not buy the fleece ones!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie & Levi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems of good quality and easy to clean, just a little smaller than I was hoping it would be. Perfect for my 130lb lab. Little small for my 190lb Great Dane. Was hoping to get lucky and have it be bigger than expected (that’s what she said...)
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: The shape is perfect for comfort
customer_reviews.text: The rolls on each side are key. My dog hardly lays on the big, plushy flat bed I bought, but he hopped right on this one and has been laying there exclusively. It’s also the perfect size for his xl dog kennel. He’s a 60/70LBS puppy so that tells ya how big this bed is, hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cheap fabric - holes in top DAY ONE
customer_reviews.text: What is the return policy for this dog bed? The top fabric is not fabric at all... it’s some fluffy substance that was torn by my greyhound’s paws the very first day we got it. She has never destroyed a dog bed (her last one is still intact after months) but she is heavy (70 lbs) and her paws went through it. Day two she decided to try and dig (nest) and it tore larger holes with chunks of stuffing out of it. And while it looks comfortable, the fact that normal one-day use has made it unsightly (and possibly dangerous since stuffing is exposed) makes me wish I hadn’t bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea CG

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS BED
customer_reviews.text: This bed is not worth the price... it is a piece of junk, poor quality, very miss leading description it is not an orthopedical dog bed it is egg crate and not waterproof at all. The bed is junk.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Waste Your $!!  Everything about this is cheaply made!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. NOT LIKE DESCRIPTION AT ALL.. don’t waste your time nor $ like I did. Outer material is thin & cheap L-shaped has little to no padding in it & the padding material is cheap, 1 time on the bed & it will be “Furever flat”. Bedding material is cheap egg crate padding & flimsy as well, possibly last a couple nights bf flattening. Not sure what the difference in materials used between the bed I received & those in pictures with multiple large breed dogs.. & I ordered the same bed as those in the photos. Unfortunately I will have to go through the return process due to false information provided by Furhaven.
customer_reviews.author: M Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving this dog bed I was really excited and the dog loved it. However, within a day or two we noticed that the fabric shed more than our lab does (which is A LOT)! After two weeks the fabric has already worn so much that holes are developing. Our dog is old and just lays on it so it is light usage, not a puppy chewing or jumping. I’m disappointed with the material because I really wanted to love this dog bed. We’ll be returning as soon as we can get a box big enough to send it back. 😑
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Manos

customer_reviews.title: I feel ripped off
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get a nice new bed for my little guy but im severely disappointed. Not only does the bed smell like a dead animal when i opened it, but its incredibly cheap and flimsy. Strings hanging all over the place. Nothing about this says safe and comfortable. Seriously, packed like a retard. How am i suppose to return something you rolled into a ball and wrapped with tape? I found a way better quality and cheaper at Walmart. I regret everything about this purchase. This is simply unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel M. Stephano

customer_reviews.title: The plush sleep surface comes off easily!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed. I wanted to give my dog ​​the pleasure of sleeping in a good bed, but the plush sleep surface comes off easily. In just 2 days of use, I had to collect a lot of lint.
customer_reviews.author: Horacio O.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in the quality of this. I usually buy dog beds from Costco but they don't currently have the one with the bolster around it so I figured I'd take a chance on purchasing this one. It is basically egg crate and there is hardly any stuffing in the bolsters. Worth $20 not $50.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, poor quality, not "orthopedic" - garbage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 "deluxe orthopedic" beds for my 2 dogs. Frankly, I was shocked when they arrived and I should have returned them right then. The foam pads and bolster stuffing were beyond thin and flimsy. The pad offers NO support - the dogs might as well have slept on the floor. The material was extremely poor quality and less than paper thin. I was completely ripped off. It seems more poor quality items are coming from Amazon, so I do not know if I will continue to purchase items from them if they aren't going to stand behind the products they sell. I work too hard to waste my hard-earned money on garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bed...poor materials
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bed in Aug. 2019 and both my dogs (80lb & 50lb) absolutely love this bed so much and would try and squeeze on the bed together, I ordered another one in November 2019. The biggest con on this bed is that the very thin and not very durable sherpa fleece material is the only thing separating your dog from the memory foam bedding. My dog put a huge hole in Sherpa fleece cover within a couple of months. I love the bed and will figure out how to repair it with sewing another more durable material in place of the cheap Sherpa fleece material Furhaven uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn S

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this bed
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst purchase from amazon I've ever made. While the cover may be machine washable, the contents of the bolster are just stuffed in there ( see image). I'm not going to try and put back. I will NEVER buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Bummer of a Dog Bed! :(
customer_reviews.text: This dog bed is very, very cheap. It’s very flat and the cover is not made with quality material. My dog ripped the cover within a few days and now it’s shredded after a month. I will say that she does enjoy laying on it, but we’ll have to throw it out soon, since it’s going to eventually fall apart. Bummer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hillary

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service! Comfy bed!
customer_reviews.text: We recently rescued a disabled 85lb American bulldog. We bought the jumbo. Perfect size. Unfortunately we didn’t know she sometimes has sleep incontinence so the very first night she wet the bed. I had registered the product and because of their 60 day worry free program they are sending me a new one. What a great company. Also I’ll add because I did try to salvage it the cover is very easy to remove and washes very nicely but the foam filling I couldn’t wash. So I would recommend getting a waterproof blanket for anyone whose dog might wee! Then you’re good to go!! Great company!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I do NOT recommend this bed. Do not waste your money. This by far the worst dog bed I have ever purchased. On a daily basis I am cleaning up after this bed. It sheds balls of fuzz constantly, see picture attached. We have been using the bed for less than two weeks and it is already wearing through, so much so that you can see the foam through the fabric. I do realize that this bed was very reasonably priced but I feel it should last longer that a couple weeks! Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A. H. L.

customer_reviews.title: Chemical odor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item based on the large number of positive reviews. When I received this dog bed I thought it was a customer return. It was not in any type of protective packaging, Just folded up in the shipping box. It did have a merchandising tag on it so I am still not sure if it was a return or not. It has a strong chemical odor which my dog sensed and would not lay on until I put an old blanket of his over to mask the smell. The odor has since dissipated. It is of average quality and the padding is adequate for my 65 lbs dog. Definitively disappointed in the quality compared to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Buyers BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: If there's any chance at all that your dog might have a single accident on this bed, do NOT buy it. One of ours had one last night (extremely rare occurrence) and we quickly found out that not only is the cover super absorbent, but the inside is literally a sponge with no cover over it to avoid soaking in liquid at all. You'd think there'd be some sort of water resistant slip like most other beds, but NOPE. We have a newborn right now and money is tight, I'm SO glad we wasted this $119... NOT. What a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Lee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: Goodness more like what is to like because I dislike almost everything about it. The picture and what I received are 2 different things. First off it is NOT 7”. Maybe from the bottom to the bolster. Second, it is not firm at all. There was so much room in the cover the foam was lose and moving around. Last, it is definitely NOT orthopedic. Three strikes. You’re out. Misleading. Deceptive. The only thing I liked was the color and the shape. I don’t make 1 star reviews lightly.
customer_reviews.author: Mariza

customer_reviews.title: If your pet doesn’t like give it a couple of weeks and they will I promise!!
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely amazed with these dog beds. I have purchased so many dog beds from so many different places and have spent so much money. These are by far the best! My dogs never ever lay on dog beds no matter what! If you buy the dog bed and your dog doesn’t lay on it I would say give it a week or two because that is exactly what happened to us. They didn’t really seem to care then I laid down on one and they came over to me and laid down with me and from then on they have been sleeping on their beds. Totally worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Had to buy another for the other pup!
customer_reviews.text: Of all the dog beds I’ve gotten my dog, this is by far his favorite! The cover feels really nice and soft and the foam mattress is super comfortable (I even tried sitting on it myself). I haven’t tried to remove/wash the cover but it seems like it would be easy enough. I chose this one specifically because there’s a plush ridge around it and my dog likes resting his head on raised surfaces. It’s perfect! Our other dog loves this bed too and keeps sneakily using it. He eventually decided to just squeeze in and slowly take over the bed while it was already occupied, so we decided to just get another one!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not memory foam...
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews regarding the misleading descriptions and made sure I selected a bed that said ‘memory foam’. Even selected the ‘memory foam’ option but I was still concerned. Sure enough- when it arrived it wasn’t memory foam, it was egg crate. Immediately stuck it back in the box and ordered from a different company who clearly provided a similar memory foam bed for the same price. Should have listened to the other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I debated on buying this bed for months before I actually pulled the trigger. The reviews were mostly positive, but I had a feeling it just wasn't going to be as plush and well made as I wanted. Low and behold, it arrive and it was what I expected... garbage! The bed is super thin and should not be classified as orthopedic. The fabric is very thin and not durable. Complete waste of money, I wish I could send back this piece of garbage and get my money back but it's too late now.
customer_reviews.author: B Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, style & comfort for my dog
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite dog bed I’ve purchased. I have a 75 lb English bulldog that we constantly have to wash his bed and this bed has two zipper sleeves you can easily remove and throw in the washer. It’s very easy to put the pillows back in also. He likes to rest his head on things so the border is perfect for him. He gets so excited when I wash it and give him his bed back. If/Whenever this one wears out, I’ll be purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: Reina

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like this bed. Its soft but firm. I have two large boxer dogs that like to cuddle and they both fit on this bed together. Its slightly small for them but they have another bed if they didn't want to cuddle. For comparison, the dog on the left is about 55 lb and the dog on the right is 80 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: WorkingmomwithRA

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Ate It In Less Than A Day!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Dogs loved this so much, they ate it. Because I did not register for this companies program with in 14 day ( you have to read the fine print), I have $90 of nothing. These are not strong or durable in any way. My dogs barely even had to put any effort into their destruction. I have gotten better beds for a third of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Huncovsky

customer_reviews.title: Removable cover that tears after 2 washes
customer_reviews.text: I will say right off the bat that my dog loves the bed. But, the whole reason I bought this bed is because I wanted one that’s easy to wash and has a removable cover. After washing it twice in a month it’s got this nice tear on the seam by the zipper. For how much I paid I definitely wouldn’t recommend a bed with this low quality of a seam to anyone looking for a reliable dog bed. The fact it tore after 1 month and 2 washes is insane to me for spending $65 or whatever I spent. Look for something more reliable unless you like wasting your money.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Irvine

customer_reviews.title: High price low quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with the quality of these products for the price. I ordered two, one for each German Shepherd, and the materials differed between them. They did not even use the same materials for the same beds that I ordered. They were very cheaply made ( in China) and the cooling gel that I paid extra for, was just a different colored foam that was glued on the top. I went to my local PetSmart and got two Kong beds for less than I paid for these two beds. Way overpriced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Not memory foam, can't wash the cover without destroying the cheap foam
customer_reviews.text: Foremost like all of the other reviews said, this is in no way shape or form memory foam, which didn't bother me the most because my dog still liked it and it was soft. Then he had an accident and I went to wash the cover and an entire layer of foam came off when I removed the cover!!! He had another accident the week after (he's a puppy) and the same thing happened again!! At this rate, the entire foam will disintegrate by spring. Not sure if I got a defective one but I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: paris

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this if you love your dog.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is not as pictured it is flat, gives no support, it smells, I gave it a bit to see if it would take shape nope it is like a used piece of foam. My daughter saw it and what is that???? Is that supposed to be a dog bed???? Oh nooo send that back!!! I touched the zipper to check out of foam and the zipper broke just fell off into my hand. I would not let my dog sleep on this if it was free!!! I bought the jumbo size for my Great Dane and it is big enough but he will never be touching this bed. It is trash is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Woody Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Great! Bed! 110 lb Germain shepherd approved!
customer_reviews.text: My dog used to sleep next to my bed every night. He had a bed in the living room but wanted to sleep by me. Well he got this bed for Christmas and he no longer sleeps by the bed no more. I even got him a thin one by the bed so he would have something but he doesn’t use it because he loves this bed so much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: My dogs aren't the easiest on beds but this one didn't even last 3 weeks before they had ripped it to shreds. I even had a crib sheet on it as a cover. I don't typically write bad reviews, and I know this isn't the most expensive dog bed, but 3 weeks is frustrating. I have an 11 year old great dane who needs the comfort of a bed and when they don't last long, its upsetting. She turns circles on it to get comfortable but I was hoping to get at least 6 months out of this bed.
customer_reviews.author: Deandra

customer_reviews.title: Probably an awesome product if you have small dogs who won’t use it often.
customer_reviews.text: Today, I have owned this bed for exactly three months. After 30 days, the middle of the bed started wearing thin. Within a week of that, a hole appeared. It has since gotten bigger. No, it isn’t a rip or tear. It’s just thin material and apparently wasn’t made for 75 pound dogs who sleep 15 hours a day even though it was $50 and large breed sized. I wish I would have returned it when I had the chance.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany G.

customer_reviews.title: JUMBO two tone espresso bed
customer_reviews.text: It was pressured to fit in a garbage bag like package, which made me skeptical about it being the correct size. However, it was the perfect size for my 90 lb. german shepherd. The plush color is lighter and has a slight pinkish tone which I did not expect. But that is comeplety fine. I imagined it to be sturdier like a memory foam pillow but, the bed feels flimsy like the Costco Kirkland bed I once purchased. The texture of the matress is not all around flat but it doesn't seem to offer as much support either. Yet it does the job of keeping my pup off the floor and he seems to have grown accustomed to it.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: The foam mattress lasted 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: The foam inside is a deep egg crate foam and it rips easily. After a few weeks, my dog started biting a hole through the top of the bed to get to the foam, but I don't blame her. When I unzipped it to remove the foam and see if I could repair the small hole she created, the foam was ripped up everywhere with chunks in different places. It was probably very uncomfortable. If your dog scratches the floor at all before laying down I would not get this bed. It's otherwise very nice and we loved it. Still, I wasn't looking to spend that much money on a bed that would only last a few weeks.
customer_reviews.author: AML9307

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Literally a POS!! I cannot believe someone would charge this much for such junk, I opened a box so small I was like this possibly cannot be it, come to find a generic piece of foam with a thin cover, I have a golden doodle and there is no way this would withstand much! Immediately sent back
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Approved by bed lounging dog— two paws up!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the jumbo bed for my 73lb blue pittie. Rocky has been in bed for hours refusing to leave his new dream bed! The bed came in a large box and was worth the money for my 12 year old dog with some arthritis who loves a comfy bed. The foam inside was nice and firm. Rocky loves the bolster that he uses as a pillow. Excellent value for this bed and very well made. My dog is in heaven.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Internet Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Size!
customer_reviews.text: I think the bed is nice, but it is way smaller than the measuremens provided in the description. Think : couch, with puffy arm rests, where the sitting area is MUCH smaller than the total length. I made a mistake of ordering a bed of the same measurements as what my dog's old bed is. He tried, but couldn't fit ...Unless he was curled up like a sleeping Bambi. For your reference: - my 13yo puppy is a bull terrier - 50lbs. BOTTOM LINE: If your dog is about pitbull size, get JUMBO. Thats what I'm exchanging it for because L wasn't big enough. Large would probably fit a 25-30lbs dog. Otherwise it is a good, solid, comfy bed.
customer_reviews.author: RPG fanatic

customer_reviews.title: Not too sure....
customer_reviews.text: As if right now, giving the item two stars. My dog loved her old bed, but it was time for something new. She is an Olde English Bulldogge. I got her the jumbo, which size wise seems perfect. The item was shipped in a square box, no plastic wrapping or anything around the item. It was folded up. I’m hoping it flattens out and takes the correct shape. She doesn’t seem interested, but hoping she’ll try it out tonight. Material seems stiff, but I do put her blanket on top. Overall so far not at all impressed. I really can’t believe the way the item was shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these beds at the same time off Amazon. They were received last night at 5pm on 9/30. I bought a brown, sage green and stone gray, all in the Jumbo size. The Stone gray bed seems to have a much thinner and cheaper material on the sleeping surface. As soon as my Akita stepped onto the bed his paw tore right through it and left two perfect paw sized holes. I did not have that issue with the other two beds. The material on the Brown and Sage Green beds seems to be a little thicker. My dogs slept on them last night and no damage to them.
customer_reviews.author: ToyKraz

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this bed
customer_reviews.text: I have three greyhounds. This is the second bed I have bought. They love it. I may have to buy another one. I am a dog bed collector. I have dog beds of various sizes and materials. I have even made my own dog beds. This dog bed is a favorite of my dogs. They all love it. The fabric is soft and the memory foam is supportive. I have only had these for a month and I can't say how well they will wear, but they certainly are a success with the hounds.
customer_reviews.author: greyhoundhappy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed! As soon as I got it out, it immediately started shedding. It has gotten so much worse! I have tried washing it and vacuuming it, nothing has worked. My dog is a burrowed and she had it for one night before holes started to appear. I chose the bed with the border because my dog likes to lean on the sides. The sides are so flat that she doesn’t have anything to lean on. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MPA

customer_reviews.title: Tosa Inu tested and approved!
customer_reviews.text: My Tosa Inu baby claimed her bed as soon as the plastic overwrap was removed and she hasn't budged since. That was 3 hours ago. She has, however, deigned to permit her Pit Bull sister to share the new bed -- I'm amazed there's room for both of them! My dogs usually lounge on my bed (I have a memory foam mattress) but they're totally loving this FurHaven dog bed and I couldn't be happier. My Tosa is now middle-aged and I'm committed to preventing any of the musculoskeletal issues this breed tends to experience, especially as they age. Looks like this memory foam dog bed will serve its purpose!
customer_reviews.author: LizzzieD

customer_reviews.title: Quality and size
customer_reviews.text: I bought a medium (2) first - sent them back. Bought a large (2). Sent them back. The large was sooooo small! My dogs are 70 and 90 lbs. Guess I needed jumbo size. But when I saw the quality, I decided to bag buying a larger size. So not impressed with the quality. I have found much better quality beds, for less, at Costco. I’m so thankful Amazon makes it incredibly easy to return purchases!
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This bed is a complete waste of money and I will be returning it. It’s paper thin. It’s literally just egg carton foam that when I squeeze it my fingers can touch. It’s definitely not as pictured. The item is light as a feather and smaller than pictured. I wouldn’t recommend this product at all. It’s lumpy and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Large bed  Not for a large  65 pound dog
customer_reviews.text: I returned this dog bed. It was way too thin...egg- crate cushion had zero support i was looking for a bed with a more substantial foam. It did have a zipper so it probably would be easy to clean. For me the problem was the bed was made for a larger dog but a larger dog is a heavier dog And the foam mattress was not substantial enough for the advertised weight.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Poor Durability for price point
customer_reviews.text: We have had this bed for 6 weeks. I do not recommend for dogs who like to knead their bed. The material on top is not durable or lined and punctured easily leaving an opening for chewing. We have several several beds and this is the first she has done this with. Considering the price point this should not have happened in less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hoel

customer_reviews.title: Great overall bed but not great for machine washing
customer_reviews.text: In regards to chew proof, my dog did not chew it. In regards to softness, it is extremely fluffy and soft. The trouble is the cleaning. Yes the lining is removable, however if you do laundry like I do every week, it will not last. I have bought over 5 different ones and none last. I wash on cold and tumble dry low as per the instructions. Sometimes I dried with no heat delicate, and it still ends up tearing and shrinking. I recommend this product for dogs that don’t require washing their items often such as a shedding dog like mines. The hair that sheds gets woven into the bed and bolster, so you have to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia M.

customer_reviews.title: Given a used item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last month for when I moved into my new apartment this week. I just opened it straight out of the box and it seems I was given a returned bed....it smells like urine and when I unzipped it to look at the padding underneath, you can clearly see the yellow/white coloration. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amber and Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived  with rips on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: Item was damaged upon arrival. My puppy really needs a bed so I am going to keep it . Seems ok despite the defect.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: I thought they were small, but turns out I bought a sectional.  Dogs love it though!
customer_reviews.text: I have absolutely no concept of size. I read the measurements, and then looked at the breed recommendations. A small would work, but I wanted to buy mediums so they would have a little bit extra room. Turns out I bought a sectional. Oops. But the pups love it, including our old girl who is an expert on all things soft. She loves to sleep and lay, and hasn’t left this bed since I placed her on it over an hour ago. I don’t think it would last with rambunctious, unsupervised pups, but for old gals with stiff joints, they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MamaHen

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this bed. He loves sleeping in it and sliding in it, so I constantly have to put it back in it's spot but he loves it, so that's okay. The bed is soft and the outside material is very nice. However, and the reason for four stars, when I received the dog bed, there was a stain the inside material and some of it was worn down. Pretty sure it had been used before which kind of ticked me off, but, it didn't smell bad so I went ahead and put it all together. My dog loves it and you know what they say, "happy dog, happy dog Mom".
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I can't vouch for chew-proof. My monster doesn't make a habit of chewing on soft objects.; in fact, all of her plush toys are still intact after 11 years. But for easy to clean and the softness, that's 10 out of 10 in rating. She loves the cushion, likes laying her head on the "pillow" roll and watching the household events without moving her head. I also like that it seems to ease her bad hip and she sleeps soundly on her soft bed and gets up with minimal stiffness. This was an excellent buy for the bucks and I will buy another when this one gives up the ghost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sides flimsy, main bed great
customer_reviews.text: First off, the main center part of the bed is perfect and is the right size for my dog. I have a Jack Russell/Westie mix dog that is 25 lbs, we got the medium bed and it is the perfect size. My only beef is the sides that should have been easily used as a head rest is very flimsy. One side has barely any stuffing and just collapses and the back and other side is movable but has an ok amount of stuffing. The fabric is decent but would not hold up to dogs that chew heavily. My dog is very old and doesn't chew anymore so I can't really say for sure on that.
customer_reviews.author: mellynjoy

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of stiff mornings
customer_reviews.text: I have a 120 pound mastador. He started waking up sore around the age of 5. I bought him this bed after doing lots of research. Took him about a week before he decided he liked it. Now he's on it every night. Has good enough padding that he isn't stiff when he gets up in the morning. Have only had it 3 months so we will see how it holds up over time. Only disappointment is the material is really thin and ripped in a couple spots. Stiched it up and all is good. Overall really is worth the $40 just to see my boy wake up and not be sore or in pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! Dozer loves his new bed!
customer_reviews.text: Received it yesterday and Dozer loves it! Dozer is 11 years old and deserves the best. He even let Cooper (on the right with the toy) try it out. Cooper is visually challenged and a little emotionally challenged from the abuse he suffered as a pup. Dozer takes a lot of crud from him and he is still good to him. We're lucky to have them both. Cooper has a lot of medical bills, but as soon as we catch up we will be ordering a few more. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie S

customer_reviews.title: Passes the GSD test...he loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the large. Orthopedic cushion. Our 80 lb GSD loves it! I could’ve probably ordered a jumbo and then he could’ve spread out a little more but we have a small house. The large is fine and he doesn’t seem to care. We had purchased a kuranda bed for almost $200 but the thing was huge - too huge for our house and he wouldn’t get in it. As soon as this bed arrived he curled up right on it and has slept in it every night since it arrived. Very happy with it and may end up purchasing the jumbo in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Crusader Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it! Perfect to use next to sectional couch.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it! And even better - it fits perfectly beside my sectional couch. My dog loves to sleep by my couch, but I noticed she would leave fur/smell on the couch where her body was touching. I put this right in the nook and the corners cover the "L" shape of my couch where her body doesn't touch the couch at all. 10/10 recommend. My dog is 50 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Laci

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive bed/couch
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my living room so my doggy could have somewhere to sit as she is not allowed on the furniture. I was wanting something that is visually pleasing and this is perfect. It is very pretty and it stands up very nicely, not saggy at all and no wrinkles in the fabric either. I got the small, my dog is about 4 pounds and it is perfect she has a little extra room to sprawl out. She loves the raised edges as a headrest. The bed/couch is pretty firm. It came ready to put out, it was not in a pressure box how i expected so that was a pleasant surprise.
customer_reviews.author: mayra

customer_reviews.title: Old dog likes her new bed
customer_reviews.text: Putting the bed together was very easy. It comes without the cover zipped. Our Jack terrier is about to turn 14 and she's become more arthritic this past year. Since getting her this new bed, she goes right to sleep without having to dig around to find a 'nest'. She's less stiff when she gets up too. I like that the cover zips off and can be washed in the machine. She recently rolled in something outside and got it on her bed before I noticed. The cover came out clean and unstained. I did hang it up to dry rather than putting it in the dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon Yarn Addict

product_meta.title: Furhaven Pet - Plush Orthopedic Sofa, L-Shaped Chaise Couch, Ergonomic Contour Mattress, & Long Faux Fur Calming Donut Dog Bed for Dogs & Cats - Multiple Styles, Sizes, & Colors
product_meta.description: Size:Large| Style:Orthopedic Foam| Color:(L Chaise) Two-Tone Stone GrayPamper your pet with a Furhaven Deluxe Orthopedic Two-Tone Plush Faux Fur & Suede L Shaped Chaise Lounge Sofa-Style Living Room Corner Couch Pet Dog Bed! A luxuriously soft faux fur sleep surface is complemented by suedine covered bolsters and gusset. Ultra-plush, flecked faux fur provides a snuggly soft sleep surface and trims the edges of the bolster for a chic flair. The two-tone design hides dirt and pet dander better than traditional plush sleep surfaces. The L-shaped bolsters support your pet’s back and hips, providing additional support. The L-shape also provides the perfect nook for pets that like to nest into comfort. The two raised, rounded bolster ends allow your pet to lay their paws or neck on the pillowed edge, helping to align the neck and spine. An orthopedic foam base features egg-crate foam that alleviates aching joints and provides soothing comfort to pressure points. The Jumbo Plus option, for larger breeds, features solid slab orthopedic foam for greater support and comfort. The zippered cover is easily removed and machine washable for your convenience. Available in various stylish colors and diverse sizing options so your pet can sprawl and lounge the day in maximum comfort and style.
feature_bullets: PET FRIENDLY DESIGN: The bed features an L-shaped chaise design with dual bolsters that promote security and provide additional high-loft cushion support for head resters and a cozy nestling nook for burrowers; it's perfect for sprawlers and cuddlers

SLEEP SURFACE: The sleep surface is lined with ultra plush faux fur, while the bolsters are wrapped in easy-care micro suede; both are soft-to-touch fabrics that no pet could ever resist snuggling into

EASY ON JOINTS: The egg crate orthopedic foam helps cushion pressure points, distribute body weight, and improve air circulation, while the fluffy-filled bolsters provide optimum support for the neck, back, hips, and joints for a more restful sleep
PRODUCT DETAILS: Stone Gray; Large, 36" x 27" x 6.5" (3" Foam; Sleep Surface: Approx. 31.5" x 22")
AVAILABLE VARIANTS: The bed comes in Espresso, Dark Sage, and Stone Gray; it's also available in Small, Medium, Large, Jumbo, and Jumbo Plus
EASY CARE: Pets can present some unique cleaning challenges, which is why Furhaven made sure that the removable dog bed cover is completely machine washable for your convenience

CUSTOMER ASSURANCE: The product comes with a 90-day limited coverage against material defects and may also qualify for our 60-Day Worry-Free Program; but restrictions apply: purchases from unauthorized third-party resellers may not be covered by Furhaven
NOT SUITABLE for pets with excessive teething or destructive chewing behavior

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
